content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 17: The price of gold has fallen by Rs 1,000 per tola (11.66 grams) in the domestic market today and is determined at Rs 216,100, said the Federation of Nepal Gold and Silver Dealers' Association. On Tuesday, gold was traded at a record price of Rs 217,100 per tola in the local market. Similarly,
